index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF HOUSING AND HUMAN SERVICES
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Housing and Human Services, authorizing application to and agreement with the Seattle Housing Authority for financial assistance for the provision of case management services to elderly and disabled residents of certain Seattle Housing Authority facilities, increasing expenditure allowances in the 1993 and 1994 Budget of the Department of Housing and Human Services, creating certain positions and making the necessary appropriations therefor.
committee: Housing, Health, Human Services and Education
